title: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
created_time: June 03, 2022, 11:49:24 AMLast edit: June 20, 2023, 06:21:58 AM by CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
content: Hello,I'm a collector and I'm looking to complete my DOGE collection of CryptoImperator's I have the 10k, 50k 100k now I'm looking for the 1,000,000 DOGE piece. Such WOW. I'm wanting to trade. I can trade for other crypto wallets and or 3x gold weight .....!!!

comments.author: Ballhog69
comments.body: I would guess 3x gold is greatly underpriced.. only a handful are actually peeled. GL

comments.author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.body: Quote from: Ballhog69 on June 03, 2022, 12:38:08 PMI would guess 3x gold is greatly underpriced.. only a handful are actually peeled. GLDo you have one for sale? 3x is a strong offer. We will see.  What would you give for a redeemed gold?

comments.author: Ballhog69
comments.body: Quote from: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES on June 03, 2022, 01:37:09 PMQuote from: Ballhog69 on June 03, 2022, 12:38:08 PMI would guess 3x gold is greatly underpriced.. only a handful are actually peeled. GLDo you have one for sale? 3x is a strong offer. We will see.  What would you give for a redeemed gold? Don't know if there's ever been a public sale of one. Maybe an og could chime in. Most people who have these are loaded so why would they sell for 3x spot?? I'd offer 10x spot.Looking at the loaded value and taking a percentage of that is somewhat helpful... ie 15% of face value... that's like 15k now or 100k at the top of doge lol (respect to those holding funded lol) Edit: I'm bad at math

comments.author: greenplastic
comments.body: I have a funded MILLON Doge coin for sale, but you know its not cheap.  Quote from: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES on June 03, 2022, 11:49:24 AMHello,I'm a collector and I'm looking to complete my DOGE collection of CryptoImperator's I have the 10k, 50k 100k now I'm looking for the 1,000,000 DOGE piece. haha Such WOW. I'm wanting to trade. I can trade for other crypto wallets and or 3x gold weight ..... LFG!!!

comments.author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.body: Quote from: Ballhog69 on June 03, 2022, 01:50:03 PMQuote from: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES on June 03, 2022, 01:37:09 PMQuote from: Ballhog69 on June 03, 2022, 12:38:08 PMI would guess 3x gold is greatly underpriced.. only a handful are actually peeled. GLDo you have one for sale? 3x is a strong offer. We will see.  What would you give for a redeemed gold? Don't know if there's ever been a public sale of one. Maybe an og could chime in. Most people who have these are loaded so why would they sell for 3x spot?? I'd offer 10x spot.Looking at the loaded value and taking a percentage of that is somewhat helpful... ie 15% of face value... that's like 15k now or 100k at the top of doge lol (respect to those holding funded lol) Edit: I'm bad at math But would you really put up 10x? Saying something is different than doing something.  Its really up to the seller though. I've been into rare collectables for over a decade and rarely do gold pieces bring 3x, but some do. the rare ones will. which is why I offered. They can always counter offer.If I only have a rare piece and people need it to finish their set. Id rather it go to them so they can finish off the set, but each their own.  10x is closer to 9k for 1/2 oz gold redeemed.

comments.author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.body: Quote from: greenplastic on June 03, 2022, 01:59:02 PMI have a funded MILLON Doge coin for sale, but you know its not cheap.  Quote from: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES on June 03, 2022, 11:49:24 AMHello,I'm a collector and I'm looking to complete my DOGE collection of CryptoImperator's I have the 10k, 50k 100k now I'm looking for the 1,000,000 DOGE piece. haha Such WOW. I'm wanting to trade. I can trade for other crypto wallets and or 3x gold weight ..... LFG!!!Beautiful man! Do you have an asking price on it? Also when you get time, Id like to see detailed photos of the hologram. Not many pictures exist.

comments.author: blucepheus
comments.body: GP passed on some solid offers back then, I imagine. That is diamond hands!

comments.author: ezeminer
comments.body: if you look into the history of the coin, you'll find even unloaded they're a lot, because well... there's only 10 that were created. Digging through the public posts, there might be 1 that could have been peeled. One being an auction gone wrong it seems.I wouldn't mind paying $5,000 for one of these unloaded in good condition right now, so it wouldn't surprise me if deeper wallet people can offer more.Here's the last public sale/auction I could find..https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1952326.0
